conversation.speaker: USER
conversation.text: I'm in the mood for a disaster movie. Could you recommend a few?

conversation.speaker: SYSTEM
conversation.text:
I think I have just the disaster movie for you!

Have you considered "Airplane!" (1980)? It's a classic comedy-disaster film that's all about chaos on an airplane, with plenty of hilarious moments and memorable characters. And who can forget Robert Hightower's iconic one-liner: "I am serious... and don't call me Shirley"?

I think I have just the thing for you! Have you considered "End of Watch"? It's a gritty, intense film that follows two young police officers as they navigate the dangers of their job in LA. With an all-star cast including Jake Gyllenhaal and Anna Kendrick, it's a must-see for fans of crime dramas.

If you're in the mood for something a bit more action-packed, "Reign of Fire" might be up your alley! It's a thrilling post-apocalyptic film that pits humans against fire-breathing dragons. With Gerard Butler and Christian Bale leading the charge, it's an epic adventure that's hard to resist.
